message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $90?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. Would you be willing to consider $105?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. Would you be willing to consider $100?
